# hostTime(forSeconds:)

**Type Method**

Converts seconds to host time.

## Declaration

```swift
class func hostTime(forSeconds seconds: TimeInterval) -> UInt64
```

## Parameters

- **seconds**: The number of seconds.

## Return Value

The host time that represents the seconds you specify.

## Manipulating Host Time

- **hostTime**: The host time.
- **isHostTimeValid**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the host time value is valid.
- **seconds(forHostTime:)**: Converts host time to seconds.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the host time value is valid.
